languages.text: {n}Словно из чуждой реальности до вас доносится ровный голос Инквизитора:{/n} "Владыка Человечества, моя жизнь принадлежит Тебе, ибо я — пылающее орудие веры, что сокрушит еретика, ксеноса и мутанта, посягнувших на царствие Твое".

traits.locale_text: "Владыка Человечества, моя жизнь принадлежит Тебе, ибо я — пылающее орудие веры в Твоих руках, что сокрушит еретика, ксеноса и мутанта, посягнувших на Царство Твое".
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}The Inquisitor's flat voice seems to be coming from a different reality:{/n} "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
languages.original_text: {n}Словно из чуждой реальности до вас доносится ровный голос Инквизитора:{/n} "Владыка Человечества, моя жизнь принадлежит Тебе, ибо я — пылающее орудие веры, что сокрушит еретика, ксеноса и мутанта, посягнувших на царствие Твое".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor's flat voice seems to be coming from a different reality:{/n} "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}大审判官平淡的声音仿佛来自另一个世界。{/n}“人类之主啊，我的生命属于您，因为我是炽热的信仰之焰。我必将粉碎一切异端分子、异形与变种人，阻止他们威胁您的王国。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's flat voice seems to be coming from a different reality:{/n} "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长平淡的声音仿佛来自另一个世界。{/n}“人类之主啊，我的生命属于您，因为我是炽热的信仰之焰。我必将粉碎一切异端分子、异形与变种人，阻止他们威胁您的王国。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}異端審問官の平坦な声は、違う世界から聞こえてくるかのようだった。{/n}「人類の盟主よ、この命はあなたに授けます。私は信念に燃え滾る武器です。あなたの帝国に反発した異端者や異種族、変異体をすべて潰します」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's flat voice seems to be coming from a different reality:{/n} "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官の平坦な声は、違う世界から聞こえてくるかのようだった。{/n}「人類の盟主よ、この命はあなたに授けます。私は信念に燃え滾る武器です。あなたの帝国に反発した異端者や異種族、変異体をすべて潰します」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}La voz del Inquisidor parece venir de otra realidad.{/n} «Amo de la humanidad, mi vida le pertenece, pues soy un arma ardiente de fe que aplastará al hereje, al xenos y al mutante que haya levantado una mano contra Su reino».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's flat voice seems to be coming from a different reality:{/n} "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del Inquisidor parece venir de otra realidad.{/n} «Amo de la humanidad, mi vida le pertenece, pues soy un arma ardiente de fe que aplastará al hereje, al xenos y al mutante que haya levantado una mano contra Su reino».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Die tonlose Stimme des Inquisitors scheint aus einer anderen Realität zu kommen.{/n} "Herr der Menschheit, mein Leben gehört Euch, denn ich bin eine flammende Waffe des Glaubens, die den Ketzer, den Xenos und den Mutanten vernichten wird, welche die Hand gegen Euer Königreich erhoben haben."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's flat voice seems to be coming from a different reality:{/n} "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die tonlose Stimme des Inquisitors scheint aus einer anderen Realität zu kommen.{/n} "Herr der Menschheit, mein Leben gehört Euch, denn ich bin eine flammende Waffe des Glaubens, die den Ketzer, den Xenos und den Mutanten vernichten wird, welche die Hand gegen Euer Königreich erhoben haben."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}La voix monocorde de l'inquisiteur semble venir d'une autre réalité.{/n} « Maître de l'Humanité, ma vie Vous appartient, car je suis une arme animée du feu de la foi, conçue pour détruire les hérétiques, les xénos et les mutants qui ont levé la main contre Votre royaume. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's flat voice seems to be coming from a different reality:{/n} "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix monocorde de l'inquisiteur semble venir d'une autre réalité.{/n} « Maître de l'humanité, ma vie Vous appartient, car je suis une arme animée du feu de la foi, conçue pour détruire les hérétiques, les xénos et les mutants qui ont levé la main contre Votre royaume. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu'nun duygudan mahrum sesi, âdeta başka bir âlemden geliyor.{/n} "İnsanlığın Efendisi, benim canım senindir. Ben; inancım uğruna senin krallığına el kaldırmış kâfirleri, zenoları ve mutantları ezecek olan ateşten kılıcım."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's flat voice seems to be coming from a different reality:{/n} "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
